chapter.title: Communicating with RESTful Spring MVC Endpoints using AMF

sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: TODO - An AmfView and AmfHttpMessageConverter are now provided with Spring BlazeDS Integration to support RESTful communication protocols as an alternative to direct RPC. This is an especially attractive option when your application needs to support more than just a Flex client. Complete documentation for the AMF support for the RESTful Spring MVC @Controller model will be provided in 1.5.0.RC1. For now, see the new insync-rest example that has been added to the Test Drive, which duplicated the full functionality of the complete inSync application that was originally built using BlazeDS Remoting.
